Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 16th overall pick, by Colorado in 2017...
Injured on 6/26/2017 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 8/5/2017, off Cleo Maldonado (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/27/2017, off Jerry Engstrom (SF)...
Injured on 8/23/2018 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2019, hitting .565 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2019...
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2020...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,014,286 through salary arbitration...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Brooklyn on 4/22/2021...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,014,286 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/3/2022 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,464,286 through salary arbitration...
